titles.title: Municipal Deposit Insurance Protection Act of 2005
Municipal Deposit Insurance Protection Act of 2005
To amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act with respect to municipal deposits.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit.

bill.summary: Municipal Deposit Insurance Protection Act of 2005 - Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to set $2 million as the maximum amount of insurance for in-State municipal depositor accounts held by an insured depository institution.
